issue.title: [R] Re-enable duckdb autocleaning
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14395](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14395). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Now that https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/pull/2408 is done, we can re-enable this (when duckdb goes to cran next).

comments.body:
